code: import{useEffect}from"react";import gsap,{Expo}from"gsap";import{ScrollTrigger}from"gsap/ScrollTrigger";gsap.registerPlugin(ScrollTrigger);export var useGsapDownStagger=function useGsapDownStagger(arr){var delay=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:0;useEffect(function(){var el=arr.map(function(item){return item.current;});gsap.fromTo(el,{y:"-100%",opacity:0},{y:0,opacity:1,duration:1.2,stagger:0.1,delay:delay,ease:Expo.easeInOut});},[]);};export var useGsapUpward=function useGsapUpward(item){var delay=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:0;useEffect(function(){var el=item.current;gsap.fromTo(el,{y:"100%",opacity:0},{y:0,opacity:1,duration:1,delay:delay,ease:Expo.easeInOut});},[]);};export var useGsapShutterUnveil=function useGsapShutterUnveil(item){var delay=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:0;var trig=arguments.length>2?arguments[2]:undefined;useEffect(function(){var el=item.current;gsap.fromTo(el,{height:"100%"},{height:0,duration:2,delay:delay,ease:Expo.easeInOut,scrollTrigger:{trigger:trig.current,toggleActions:"play reverse play reverse"}});},[]);};export var useGsapLeftWalking=function useGsapLeftWalking(item){useEffect(function(){var el=item.current;gsap.fromTo(el,{x:"-100vw"},{x:0,duration:1.5,ease:Expo.easeInOut,scrollTrigger:{trigger:el,toggleActions:"play"}});},[]);};export var useGsapFeaturedLeftShutter=function useGsapFeaturedLeftShutter(item,trig){useEffect(function(){var el=item.current;gsap.fromTo(el,{height:"100%"},{height:0,duration:1.2,ease:Expo.easeInOut,scrollTrigger:{trigger:trig.current,start:"top center",end:"bottom center",toggleActions:"play reverse play reverse"}});},[]);};export var useGsapFeaturedRightShutter=function useGsapFeaturedRightShutter(item,trig){useEffect(function(){var el=item.current;gsap.fromTo(el,{width:"100%"},{width:0,duration:1.2,delay:0.2,ease:Expo.easeInOut,scrollTrigger:{trigger:trig.current,start:"top center",end:"bottom center",toggleActions:"play reverse play reverse"}});},[]);};export var useGsapGalleryImg=function useGsapGalleryImg(item){useEffect(function(){var el=item.current;gsap.fromTo(el,{width:0,x:0},{width:"100%",x:"30%",duration:1,ease:Expo.easeInOut,scrollTrigger:{trigger:el,start:"top center",end:"bottom top",toggleActions:"play reverse play reverse"}});},[]);};export var useGsapGalleryTitle=function useGsapGalleryTitle(item,trig){useEffect(function(){var el=item.current;gsap.fromTo(el,{x:"30%"},{x:0,duration:1,ease:Expo.easeInOut,scrollTrigger:{trigger:trig.current,start:"top center",end:"bottom top",toggleActions:"play reverse play el=item.current;gsap.fromTo(el,{x:"-100vw"},{x:0,duration:1,ease:Expo.easeInOut,scrollTrigger:{trigger:trig.current,start:"top center",end:"bottom top",toggleActions:"play reverse play reverse"}});},[]);};export var useGsapFooterHeadline=function useGsapFooterHeadline(item,trig){useEffect(function(){var el=item.current;gsap.fromTo(el,{y:"-100%"},{y:0,duration:1,ease:Expo.easeInOut,scrollTrigger:{trigger:trig.current,toggleActions:"play"}});},[]);};export var useGsapNotFoundHeadline=function useGsapNotFoundHeadline(item){var vw=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:"-100vw";useEffect(function(){var el=item.current;gsap.fromTo(el,{x:vw},{x:0,duration:1.5,ease:Expo.easeInOut});},[]);};export var useGsapNotFoundImg=function useGsapNotFoundImg(item){useEffect(function(){var el=item.current;gsap.fromTo(el,{scale:0,borderRadius:"50%"},{scale:1,borderRadius:0,duration:4,delay:1,ease:"elastic"});},[]);};export var useGsapPhotoScroller=function useGsapPhotoScroller(arr){useEffect(function(){var el=arr.map(function(item){return item.current;});gsap.fromTo(el,{y:"-100vh",scale:0},{y:0,scale:1,delay:2.2,duration:2,stagger:0.2,ease:Expo.easeInOut});},[]);};export var useGsapPhotoLevitate=function useGsapPhotoLevitate(arr,trig){useEffect(function(){var el=arr.map(function(item){return item.current;});gsap.fromTo(el,{y:0},{y:"-30%",ease:Expo.easeInOut,scrollTrigger:{trigger:trig.current,scrub:1,toggleActions:"play reverse play reverse"}});},[]);};
